metadata.title: CVE-2022-21127 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Incomplete cleanup in specific special register read operations for some Intel(R) Processors may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable information disclosure via local access.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-21127` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20220510.0ubuntu0.21.10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20220510.0ubuntu0.21.10.1').
